steps.label: Heat at least {ml}ml of water
steps.explanation: Use good filtered water; it will affect the quality of the brew

steps.label: Rinse paper filter with hot water
steps.explanation: This removes any paper taste and preheats the brewer

steps.label: Add coffee grounds to the V60
Create a well in the middle of the grounds
steps.explanation: This helps to evenly saturate all the grounds during the blooming phase

steps.label: Pour {grams}g of water over the grounds, evenly saturating them
steps.explanation: Set your V60 on top of a scale and press TARE to zero out the display.

steps.label: Swirl the coffee slurry until evenly mixed
steps.explanation: The aim is to wet all the coffee grounds by evenly mixing bloom water and coffee

steps.label: Get ready to pour up to {grams}g of cumulative weight in {seconds} seconds
Continue pouring up to the total brew weight of {grams}g in {seconds} seconds
